name: merge(with:_:_:)
desc: Combines elements from this publisher with those from three other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
declaration: func merge<B, C, D>(with b: B, _ c: C, _ d: D) -> Publishers.Merge4<Self, B, C, D> where B : Publisher, C : Publisher, D : Publisher, Self.Failure == B.Failure, Self.Output == B.Output, B.Failure == C.Failure, B.Output == C.Output, C.Failure == D.Failure, C.Output == D.Output
